name: Falcon Hiking The Adirondacks 2nd Edition
description: Whether you're brand-new to hiking or a seasoned backpacker, you'll be able to choose from 47 day hikes and weekend backpacking trips to some of the most scenic locations in New York's Adirondack Park. Hiking the Adirondacks includes detailed trail descriptions with mile-by-mile directions, GPS coordinates, difficulty ratings, average hiking times and even notes on dog-friendliness. The guide also offers information about the area's human history, geology and flora and fauna.
